form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Whitehouse introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To extend temporarily the extended period of protection for members of uniformed services relating to mortgages, mortgage foreclosure, and eviction, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Foreclosure Relief and Extension for Servicemembers Act of 2015.

section.header: Temporary extension of extended period of protections for members of uniformed services relating to mortgages, mortgage foreclosure, and eviction
section.text: Section 710(d) of the Honoring America's Veterans and Caring for Camp Lejeune Families Act of 2012 (Public Law 112–154; 50 U.S.C. App. 533 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking December 31, 2015 and inserting December 31, 2016; and
in paragraph (3), by striking January 1, 2016 and inserting January 1, 2017.
